name: Human Toy Facility
description:
Welcome to the human toy facility. The design is very human.

Your task is to package the boxes of toys to meet the specification. The only problem is, you won't know what any of it means... Can you get the highest AEXZZ???

This is a submission for UoM GameJam 2023 with the theme 'Lost In Translation'. This is my first solo game jam so I hope you enjoy playing!

NOTE - the black box is for deleting unwanted objects, please do not be distracted by it when solving the puzzles!

Credits for some of the 3D models used:

"Rubber duck" (https://skfb.ly/6TsSv) by Ikki_3d is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

"Wood Tractor" (https://skfb.ly/oFOJS) by LucasPresoto is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
